alert.note: Alert for Hodgeman; Ness; Pawnee; Rush (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 1:53AM CDT until August 09 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ness County in west central Kansas... Northeastern Hodgeman County in southwestern Kansas... Northwestern Pawnee County in south central Kansas... Western Rush County in central Kansas... * Until 245 AM CDT. * At 152 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Brownell to near Bazine to 11 miles south of Ness City, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Bazine around 200 AM CDT. Alexander around 210 AM CDT. McCracken and Nekoma around 220 AM CDT. Burdett around 230 AM CDT. Hargrave around 235 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
